channel.title: Timer question

item.title: Timer question
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Right now, these drops occur every half second or so. I would like to change it to 10 seconds.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4565) { //easter basket ItemHandler.addItem(1961, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1961, absX, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1961, absX-1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1961, absX+1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); }

Any ideas?

Read full topic
